<!-- Check all that apply. Add N/A if not applicable -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] Existing tests pass with my changes
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works (if applicable)
- [ ] The build passes (`npm run build`)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the **README.md** (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated **docs/FEATURES.md** (for new features)
- [ ] I have updated the **CHANGELOG.md**
- [ ] I have updated **JSDoc comments** for new functions
- [ ] I have added/updated **inline comments** for complex logic

### Database & API
- [ ] I have created/updated database migrations (if applicable)
- [ ] I have documented new API endpoints in **docs/API.md** (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated environment variable examples in `.env.example` (if applicable)

### Deployment
- [ ] Changes are deployable to Vercel without configuration changes
- [ ] New environment variables are documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations are backward compatible (if applicable)
